languages.text: "Никогда в жизни не подумал бы, что после {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}побега от одних ксеносов{/d}, чуть не выпустивших мне кишки, я найду приют в логове других, братающихся с еретиками".

traits.locale_text: "Никогда в жизни не подумал бы, что после побега от одних ксеносов, чуть не выпустивших мне кишки, я найду приют в логове других, братающихся с еретиками".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."
languages.original_text: "Никогда в жизни не подумал бы, что после {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}побега от одних ксеносов{/d}, чуть не выпустивших мне кишки, я найду приют в логове других, братающихся с еретиками".

traits.locale_text: "Never in my life would I have thought that I'd escape from xenos who had nearly spilled my guts... only to find shelter in the den of other xenos rubbing shoulders with heretics."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Never in my life would I have thought that I'd escape from xenos who had nearly spilled my guts... only to find shelter in the den of other xenos rubbing shoulders with heretics."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Never in my life would I have thought I'd escape from xenos who had nearly spilled my guts, only to find shelter in the den of other xenos rubbing shoulders with heretics."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Never in my life would I have thought I'd escape from xenos who had nearly spilled my guts, only to find shelter in the den of other xenos rubbing shoulders with heretics."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「内臓を摘出しようとした{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}異種族から逃げ出した{/d}後に、まさか異端者たちと肩を並べる他の異種族たちの巣窟に身を寄せることになるとは思ってもみませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."

traits.locale_text: 「内臓を摘出しようとした{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}異種族から逃げ出した{/d}後に、まさか異端者たちと肩を並べる他の異種族たちの巣窟に身を寄せることになるとは思ってもみませんでした」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “我根本不敢想象这辈子居然会经历这种事情，刚刚{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}从一群准备把我开膛破肚的异形手下逃出来{/d}，马上就跑到了另外一群异形的巢穴里，和异端分子称兄道弟。”
languages.original_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."

traits.locale_text: “我从来没想过这辈子居然会经历这种事情，刚刚从一群准备把我开膛破肚的异形手下逃出来，却跑到了另外一只异形的避难所里，和一群异端分子称兄道弟。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Jamás en mi vida habría pensado que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escaparía de los xenos{/d} que casi me habían despedazado, solo para acabar refugiándome en la guarida de otros xenos que se codean con herejes».
languages.original_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."

traits.locale_text: «Jamás en mi vida habría pensado que escaparía de xenos que casi me habían hecho pedazos, solo para encontrar refugio en la guarida de otros xenos, codeándome con herejes».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Ich hätte mir nie vorstellen können, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}den Xenos zu entkommen{/d}, die mich beinahe ausgeweidet hätten, nur um bei anderen Xenos Zuflucht zu finden, die mit Häretikern gemeinsame Sache machen."
languages.original_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte nie im Leben gedacht, dass ich einmal vor Xenos fliehe, die mich fast ausgeweidet hätten, nur um dann im Versteck anderer Xenos unter Ketzern Zuflucht zu finden."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Jamais je n'aurais cru un jour {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}échapper à des xénos{/d} voués à m'ouvrir les entrailles pour me retrouver dans le repaire d'autres xénos qui fricotent avec des hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais je n'aurais cru un jour {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}échapper à des xénos{/d} voués à m'ouvrir les entrailles pour me retrouver dans le repaire d'autres xénos qui fricotent avec des hérétiques. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Neredeyse bağırsaklarımı deşecek {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}zenolardan kaçıp{/d} kâfirlerle iş çeviren başka zenoların inine sığınacağım, aklımın ucundan geçmezdi."
languages.original_text: "I never would've imagined that I'd {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}escape from the xenos{/d} who nearly disembowelled me only to take refuge in the den of different xenos who rub shoulders with heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Neredeyse bağırsaklarımı deşecek {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_VigastisSaved}zenolardan kaçıp{/d} kâfirlerle iş çeviren başka zenoların inine sığınacağım, aklımın ucundan bile geçmemişti."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
